title: Montréal reveals first details of 2026 worlds road race route
content:
Route will celebrate history with a course that harks back to the 1974 worlds, which were won by Eddy Merckx and Geneviève Gambillon.

Read the full article at Montréal reveals first details of 2026 worlds road race route on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
